price: Na wapigie mfano wa wakaazi wa mji walipo wafikia walio tumwa.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Watajie watu wako kisa cha mji mmoja  Kwani hicho ni kama kisa chao. Waliwaendea Wajumbe walio tumwa ili wawahidi (awaongoze). Baadhi wa wafasiri wanasema mji huo ni Antiokia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
